headline: Can Disney Restore Wall Streets Faith in Hollywood (and Streaming) After a Dismal Earnings Cycle?
author: Joe Bel Bruno
sentences: Investors hope the worlds largest entertainment conglomerate will calm frayed nerves after Netflix kicked off the industry-wide anxiety on April 19 by reporting a 200,000 drop in subscribers  its first loss in more than a decade  and warned of steeper declines ahead as layoffs have already begun.

Is anything good happening?? analyst Rich Greenfield wrote referring to metrics used to judge the performance of entertainment and media companies, such as advertising, streaming subscriptions and cable bundling.
The Walt Disney Co. reports its fiscal second-quarter earnings after the closing bell on Wednesday, closing out what has been an unusually turbulent earnings season for the entertainment industry.
